abce.util.reflection
Class StimulusManager

java.lang.Object
  abce.util.reflection.StimulusManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resolvable
public class StimulusManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Resolvable

StimulusManager examines classes and stores information about the methods tagged as Stimulus. It also is used to resolve and invoke method paths.

Author:
ruppmatt

resolve

protected java.lang.Object resolve(int depth,
                                   java.lang.String path,
                                   java.lang.Object ctx,
                                   java.lang.Object... params)
                            throws UnresolvableException
Internal method (called recursively) to resolve path // Class objects passed in as context are treated as assistants // TODO: This may be deprecated; assistants where originally envisioned // to be classes containing only static members; however any sort of // generics (e.g. to handle collections by iterating over them) requires // non-static methods and a call to at least an object constructor. The // resolution method below, in fact, makes this assumption.

Parameters:
depth - the current depth of the resolution
path - the remaining path to resolve
ctx - the next object to invoke a method upon
params - the parameters used to invoke the next method
Returns:
Throws:
UnresolvableException
